metadata.name: Hello World - Kloov Genesis NFT #1
metadata.description:
This NFT includes only a sample of the original music, own it and go to the NFT page on KLOOV to listen to the Full Track https://kloov.com/kloov/full-track/hello-world-kloov-genesis-nft.

This is the First Kloov NFT!

The initial owners of this NFT are the Kloovers who were present for the launch.

This is also a ticket to our next party and moreâ€¦ TBA

Thank you to all of you for the hard work and Congrats!
